name: spo-get-spfx-apipermissions
title: GET API Permissions for SPFx solutions
shortDescription: To enhance your tenant's security posture, it's crucial to regularly review the API permissions requested by SPFx solutions
longDescription: To enhance your tenant's security posture, it's crucial to regularly review the API permissions requested by SPFx solutions and compare them with those granted to the SharePoint Online Client Extensibility Web Application Principal

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample to GET API Permissions for SPFx solutions

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
